title: Maa Durga ‘my kind of woman’: Sushmita Sen
text: I would like to emulate goddess Durga as she is the epitome of mother. Zee News 9 hours ago - Lifestyle Mumbai, Oct 21 : Actress Sushmita Sen has said she would like to emulate Goddess Durga as she is the epitome of mother, adding that she was "my kind of woman". newKerala.com 10 hours ago - Entertainment You Might Like
